favourite.article: Hallelujah! Encourage one another even more as the day approaches! He is coming soon!
Hallelujah, our Christ will come again! Lord, we long for Your coming!

His love is immeasurable. He is coming to take us to Himself. He has removed our barriers, He has silenced the evil one. He has shown us the way. But He is still coming back because in His love, He wants to take us by hand to Himself. HE IS AWESOME. PRAISE BE TO OUR GOD.
OH GLORY BE TO GOD!! GLORY TO THE LAMB!!! OUR GOD WILL SOON BE BACK PRAISE THE LORD!!!!
What a Glory! We with Him shall reign!
Glory Glory, soon our Lord will come again!
